page.title: 18LIFE STYLES
page.content: GIRLS CLOTHING IS VERY IMPORTANT TO THEM.MOST GIRLS WEAR COLOURS OF WHITE AND PEPPERMINT GREEN.TIGHT JEANS ARE FASHIONABLE.BAGGY COTTON TOPS ARE COMMON,ALSO TIGHT COTTON SKIRTS WITH BUTTONS UP THE BACK.MOST PEOPLE LIKE TO WEAR WHITE,BLACK,GREY AND RED SHOES. SOME MAY BE HIGH,SOME FLAT.THEY LIKE THEM TO BE POINTED.IN THE SUMMER MANY GIRLS WEAR JELLYBEAN SHOES.THEY ARE VERY COMFORTABLE AND COME IN DIFFERENT COLOURS. GIRLS LIKE JEWELLERY,IT IS VERY IMPORTANT TO THEM.THEY LIKE TO HAVE BRIGHT COLOURS IN EARRINGS AND NECK- LACES.EARRINGS ARE BIG AND CAN BE ALL SHAPES.THEBEST JEWELLERY HAS A SPLASH EFFECT ON IT.
